content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw3;

/*
Campain Requirement
Let start with the SELECT statement required to satify the requirement 


-- Check just to get the datetime (tip_date)
SELECT TOP(100)
        year,
        month,
        CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date
FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td 
WHERE year = '2020'
AND month = '01'
*/

SELECT TOP(100)
        year,
        month,
        tz.borough,
        CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date
FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td 
JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.location_id)
WHERE year = '2020'
AND month = '01'
